cu.explanation_en: Setting the RRC log level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and potential startup failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RA response window to a negative value -1 will cause invalid configuration and RACH procedure failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RA 回應視窗設定為負值 -1 會導致無效配置，並造成 RACH 程序失敗。
